headline: Apollo Doubles Down on Real Estate With Bridge Deal
summary: Apollo Global Management is buying Bridge Investment Group Holdings for about $1.5 billion in an all-stock deal. Bridge is a Salt Lake City-based firm with about $50 billion in real estate...
